title: In Memory
description: A documentary on death and grieving in the digital age, In Memory follows the story of PlainWhite Tom, a Chicago street performer who took his life on New Years Day, 2013. The film explores our 'digital presence' and the role social media plays in forming new communities between family and friends of the bereaved. . . . Made in 72U with Morgan Bouttier, Isiaiah Clayborne, Jeremy Eichenbaum, Clare Jensen, Jorge Moreno, Sofia Navarro, Karen Oliveros, Erika Ruiz, David Saldoff and Maria Scileppi.
